data.actual_result: a user who has dark role color is displays as thinner against the other one who uses light color
data.expected_result: the nickname/username of a user from overlay and desktop client should be same
data.short_description: usernames from text overlay is thinner if you are using dark color against lighter color which is thicker.
data.steps_to_repro: - open overlay from a game. go to a server with colored roles.  - go to a text channel. find a user with dark shade of colored role. - compare username colors from desktop client and overlay
